title: type identification
content:
this has me stumped, needing to redo a logo and the client wants to keep this font anyone any idea at all? Im usually pretty good but this is a tricky one! Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084259im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Dryarch_Header_5490.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Dryarch\_Header.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084259/http:/typophile.com/files/Dryarch_Header.jpg) | 24.69 KB |
author: markwillett

comments.content: any help appreciated, thanks in advance
thus far, [Antaviana](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014084259/http:/www.ffonts.net/Antaviana-Bold.font) is the closest i've found.

thats a pretty close match the best Id found was 'forgotten world' which is miles away compared to Antavianna. Many thanks defiantone I think that will do it.

regards Mark
